video_prompt: Dandelion seeds drift from an open book, carried by an unseen breeze. A ginger cat's tail subtly shifts, while a tiny gerbil's whiskers twitch, following the floating seeds. Sunlight streams through a window, its intensity gently fading over time.
image_prompt: Whimsical high-angle: cozy rustic study with tall wooden bookshelves. Foreground: aged wooden desk with an open, illegible book from which vibrant green dandelions with floating white seeds burst forth. To the left, a ginger cat; to the right, a tiny gerbil watching the seeds. Further right, a drawing of a blue butterfly emerging from black ink beside a fountain pen. A large window on the right shows a warm setting sun, illuminating the scene. Serene wonder, magical, combining nature, literature, and art.
refined_video_prompt: Dandelion seeds drift from the book, carried by an unseen breeze, scattering across the scene. A cat's tail subtly shifts. A gerbil's whiskers keenly twitch, tracking the floating seeds. Sunlight through the window gently fades in intensity.
